description: Enjoy a quick 15-minute coffee break in Münster’s Kaffeekommune, known for its specialty coffee and relaxed atmosphere.

locationInfo.description: Kaffeekommune is a popular coffee shop in the heart of Münster, perfect for a quick yet high-quality coffee break.
safetyTips: Mind your personal belongings in crowded spaces.
Respect the seating arrangements to ensure a calm environment.

description: Take a refreshing 30-minute walk through the peaceful Stadtpark, ideal for a brief solo stroll surrounded by greenery.

locationInfo.description: Stadtpark is a serene park with wide walking paths and lovely views, perfect for a short, refreshing solo walk.
safetyTips: Be mindful of cyclists using the same path.

activity: Ice Cream Break at Eisdiele Eiskultur
description: Indulge in a 20-minute solo ice cream break at Eisdiele Eiskultur, known for its delicious, locally made gelato.

locationInfo.description: Eisdiele Eiskultur is a charming ice cream parlor in Münster, offering a wide variety of delicious gelato flavors to enjoy in a short break.
safetyTips: Check for any food allergies before choosing your ice cream.

activity: Quick Visit to the Münster Cathedral
description: Take a brief 25-minute visit to the stunning Münster Cathedral, one of the city's most iconic landmarks.

locationInfo.description: The Münster Cathedral is an architectural marvel located in the city center, offering a peaceful and inspiring environment for a short visit.
safetyTips: Be respectful of ongoing services or activities in the cathedral.
Mind the floor when exploring the interior.

description: Take 30 minutes to relax by the tranquil shores of Aa-See, a perfect spot for a short solo break with a scenic view.

locationInfo.description: Aa-See is a peaceful lake, ideal for sitting by the shore, reflecting, and enjoying the beauty of nature in a brief but refreshing solo session.
safetyTips: Be cautious near the water's edge.
